text: Kate Gallego (n√©e Widland, October 21, 1981) is an American politician. She is the 61st and current Mayor of Phoenix, Arizona since 2019. Gallego is a member of the Democratic Party. She was a member of the Phoenix City Council from 2014 to 2018. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Phoenix, Arizona Category:Politicians from Albuquerque, New Mexico Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Kate Gallego
